MAIN_UNAUTH.descr: A powerful tool for testing and interacting with your APIs. Please sign in or register to continue.

MAIN.project: API Nexus is an intuitive tool that allows you to easily test and interact with your APIs. Our application provides a user-friendly interface for sending requests, viewing responses, and managing APIs.
MAIN.course_1: This project is part of the ReactJS course from RS School
MAIN.course_2: . The course covers all the key aspects of React application development and helps students apply the acquired knowledge in practice through real projects

SIGN_IN.title: Sign in to your account
SIGN_IN.login_duration: You will stay signed in for {sessionDurationHours, plural, =1 {1 hour} other {# hours}}. Please log in again after this time expires.

RESTFUL_CLIENT.title: RESTful Client
RESTFUL_CLIENT.description: Explore and interact with RESTful APIs.

GRAPHQL_CLIENT.title: GraphQL Client
GRAPHQL_CLIENT.description: Explore and interact with GraphQL APIs.

HISTORY.title: History
HISTORY.description: View the history of your interactions and changes.

NOT_FOUND.title: 404 - Not Found
NOT_FOUND.message: Sorry, we couldn`t find the page you were looking for.

valeriya.name: Valeriya Tikhonova
valeriya.bio: My name is Valeria and I am a beginner frontend developer who strives to create beautiful and functional web applications. I am passionate about web development and constantly develop my skills in working with modern technologies. At the moment, I am actively studying: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. I am always open to new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer and bring value to the team.

ana.name: Ana Tvaliashvili
ana.bio: Greetings! I am a motivated tech enthusiast transitioning into a career in technology, currently enrolled in courses at RSSchool in front-end development and AWS Cloud Developer training. With a strong commitment to self-development, I am eager to leverage my skills and knowledge in tech to drive innovative solutions and contribute to impactful projects.

alex.name: Alexandra Paramonova
alex.bio: Hi! I am a beginner front-end developer with a keen interest in building engaging and user-friendly web applications. I'm excited to apply my skills to real-world projects, collaborate with others and take on new challenges in the field. I'm grateful for the opportunity to learn from RS School, which has given me a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript!

VALIDATION.user-name-min-length: UserName must be at least 3 characters long.
VALIDATION.password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
VALIDATION.password-must-contain-special: Contain at least one special character.

ERRORS.app/unknown-error: An unexpected error occurred{errorCode}. Please try again.
ERRORS.auth/email-already-exists: This email is already in use. Please use a different email address.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-email: Invalid email format. Please enter a valid email address.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-password: Invalid password. Your password must be at least six characters long.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-display-name: Invalid name. Name must be a non-empty string.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-session-cookie-duration: Session duration is out of range. It must be between 5 minutes and 2 weeks.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-uid: User ID must be a non-empty string with a maximum of 128 characters.
ERRORS.auth/missing-uid: User ID is required to complete this operation.
ERRORS.auth/session-cookie-expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
ERRORS.auth/session-cookie-revoked: Your session has been revoked. Please log in again.
ERRORS.auth/uid-already-exists: This user ID is already in use. Please use a different one.
ERRORS.auth/timeout: The operation timed out. Please try again.
ERRORS.auth/user-token-expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
ERRORS.auth/user-not-found: No user found with this information. The account may have been deleted.
ERRORS.auth/weak-password: Your password is too weak. It must be at least 6 characters long.
ERRORS.auth/id-token-expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
ERRORS.auth/id-token-revoked: Your session has been revoked. Please sign in again.
ERRORS.auth/insufficient-permission: Insufficient permissions to perform this action. Please check your credentials.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-argument: There was an issue with the provided information. Please check and try again.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-id-token: The provided session token is invalid. Please log in again.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-last-sign-in-time: Last sign-in time is not in a valid format.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-page-token: Invalid page token. Please provide a valid token.
ERRORS.auth/project-not-found: No project found. Please check your credentials and try again.
ERRORS.auth/admin-restricted-operation: This action is restricted to administrators.
ERRORS.auth/app-not-authorized: This app is not authorized to use Firebase Authentication. Please check your API key settings.
ERRORS.auth/app-not-installed: The required mobile app is not installed on this device.
ERRORS.auth/cors-unsupported: Your browser does not support this action.
ERRORS.auth/credential-already-in-use: This credential is already linked to another account.
ERRORS.auth/custom-token-mismatch: The provided custom token does not match the expected audience.
ERRORS.auth/requires-recent-login: For security reasons, please log in again to complete this action.
ERRORS.auth/dependent-sdk-initialized-before-au: Please initialize Firebase Authentication before using other Firebase services.
ERRORS.auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already associated with another account.
ERRORS.auth/emulator-config-failed: Unable to configure the emulator after making a network request. Please call 'connectAuthEmulator()' earlier.
ERRORS.auth/expired-action-code: The link has expired. Please request a new one.
ERRORS.auth/internal-error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-app-id: The app ID is not registered with this project.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-user-token: Your credentials are not valid for this project. Please sign in again.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-api-key: Invalid API key. Please check your configuration.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-cert-hash: The provided certificate hash is invalid.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-credential: Your credentials are invalid or expired. Please check and try again.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-message-payload: The email message contains invalid characters. Please update the email template.
ERRORS.auth/unauthorized-domain: This domain is not authorized for this operation. Please check your domain settings.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-action-code: The action code is invalid or expired.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-persistence-type: Invalid persistence type. It must be 'local', 'session', or 'none'.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-recipient-email: The recipient email address is invalid.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-sender: The sender's email or name is invalid. Please update the email template.
ERRORS.auth/auth-domain-config-required: Authentication domain is missing in your app's configuration.
ERRORS.auth/app-deleted: This Firebase app instance has been deleted.
ERRORS.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: An account already exists with this email address but different sign-in credentials. Please sign in using the correct provider.
ERRORS.auth/network-request-failed: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
ERRORS.auth/no-auth-event: An unexpected error occurred during authentication.
ERRORS.auth/no-such-provider: No account found with the provided provider.
ERRORS.auth/null-user: The user is not logged in. Please log in and try again.
ERRORS.auth/operation-not-allowed: This sign-in method is not enabled. Please check your settings.
ERRORS.auth/operation-not-supported-in-this-env: This operation is not supported in your current environment. Make sure you're using a supported protocol.
ERRORS.auth/quota-exceeded: You have exceeded the quota for this operation. Please try again later.
ERRORS.auth/redirect-cancelled-by-user: The sign-in process was canceled. Please try again.
ERRORS.auth/redirect-operation-pending: A sign-in operation is already in progress. Please wait or complete it.
ERRORS.auth/rejected-credential: The credentials provided were rejected. Please try again.
ERRORS.auth/too-many-requests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
ERRORS.auth/claims-too-large: The data you provided for user claims is too large. Please ensure it doesn't exceed 1000 bytes.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-claims: The custom claims you provided are not valid. Please check the format and values.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-creation-time: The creation time must be a valid date in UTC format.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-disabled-field: The 'disabled' field must be a true or false value.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-email-verified: The 'emailVerified' field must be a true or false value.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-algorithm: The hash algorithm must be one of the supported types.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-block-size: The block size for the hash must be a valid number.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-derived-key-length: The key length for the hash must be a valid number.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-key: The hash key must be a valid byte buffer.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-memory-cost: The memory cost for the hash must be a valid number.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-parallelization: The parallelization factor for the hash must be a valid number.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-rounds: The number of rounds for the hash must be a valid number.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-hash-salt-separator: The salt separator for the hash must be a valid byte buffer.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-password-hash: The password hash must be a valid byte buffer.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-password-salt: The password salt must be a valid byte buffer.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-photo-url: The photo URL you provided is not valid. It must be a proper URL format.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-provider-data: The provider data must be a valid list of user information objects.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-oauth-responsetype: You should set only one OAuth response type to true.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-user-import: The user record you are trying to import is not valid.
ERRORS.auth/maximum-user-count-exceeded: You have exceeded the maximum number of users allowed for import.
ERRORS.auth/missing-hash-algorithm: You need to provide a hashing algorithm and its parameters to import users with password hashes.
ERRORS.auth/missing-oauth-client-secret: You need to provide the OAuth client secret to enable OIDC code flow.
ERRORS.auth/phone-number-already-exists: The phone number is already associated with another user. Each phone number must be unique.
ERRORS.auth/reserved-claims: Some custom claims you provided are reserved for system use. Avoid using OIDC-specific claims as custom keys.
ERRORS.auth/captcha-check-failed: The reCAPTCHA token is invalid, expired, or the domain does not match the allowed domains.
ERRORS.auth/code-expired: The verification code has expired. Please request a new code and try again.
ERRORS.auth/cordova-not-ready: The Cordova framework is not yet ready.
ERRORS.auth/dynamic-link-not-activated: Please activate Dynamic Links in the Firebase Console and agree to the terms and conditions.
ERRORS.auth/email-change-needs-verification: Users with multi-factor authentication must have a verified email.
ERRORS.auth/cancelled-popup-request: The operation was canceled because another popup was opened.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-app-credential: The phone verification request has an invalid application verifier or the reCAPTCHA token is invalid or expired.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-verification-code: The SMS verification code is incorrect or expired. Please resend the code and make sure to use the correct one.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-continue-uri: The continue URL provided is not valid.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-cordova-configuration: Please install the required Cordova plugins for OAuth sign-in: cordova-plugin-buildinfo, cordova-universal-links-plugin, cordova-plugin-browsertab, cordova-plugin-inappbrowser, and cordova-plugin-customurlscheme.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-custom-token: The custom token is in an incorrect format. Please refer to the documentation for proper formatting.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-dynamic-link-domain: The dynamic link domain you provided is not set up or authorized for your project.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-emulator-scheme: The emulator URL must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-multi-factor-session: You need to provide proof of successful sign-in with the first factor.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-oauth-provider: Only OAuth providers are supported for this operation. EmailAuthProvider is not supported.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-oauth-client-id: The OAuth client ID is invalid or does not match the API key.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-phone-number: The phone number format is incorrect. Please use the E.164 format: [+][country code][subscriber number].
ERRORS.auth/invalid-verification-id: The verification ID used is invalid.
ERRORS.auth/invalid-tenant-id: The tenant ID for the Auth instance is not valid.
ERRORS.auth/missing-android-pkg-name: An Android Package Name is required if the app must be installed.
ERRORS.auth/missing-app-credential: The phone verification request is missing an application verifier. Please provide a reCAPTCHA token.
ERRORS.auth/missing-verification-code: The phone auth credential was created without a verification code.
ERRORS.auth/missing-continue-uri: A continue URL is required in the request.
ERRORS.auth/missing-ios-bundle-id: An iOS Bundle ID is required if an App Store ID is provided.
ERRORS.auth/missing-or-invalid-nonce: The request is missing or has an invalid nonce. Ensure the nonce matches the hashed nonce in the ID token.
ERRORS.auth/missing-multi-factor-info: You need to provide information for the second authentication factor.
ERRORS.auth/missing-multi-factor-session: Proof of successful sign-in with the first factor is missing.
ERRORS.auth/missing-phone-number: Please provide a phone number to send verification codes.
ERRORS.auth/missing-verification-id: The phone auth credential was created without a verification ID.
ERRORS.auth/multi-factor-info-not-found: No matching second factor found for the provided identifier.
ERRORS.auth/multi-factor-auth-required: You need to verify ownership of a second factor to complete sign-in.
ERRORS.auth/popup-blocked: The popup could not be opened. It may have been blocked by your browser.
ERRORS.auth/popup-closed-by-user: The popup was closed before completing the operation.
ERRORS.auth/provider-already-linked: The user can only be linked to one identity for this provider.
ERRORS.auth/second-factor-already-in-use: This second factor is already linked to the account.
ERRORS.auth/maximum-second-factor-count-exceede: The maximum number of second factors for a user has been exceeded.
ERRORS.auth/tenant-id-mismatch: The tenant ID provided does not match the Auth instance's tenant ID.
ERRORS.auth/unauthorized-continue-uri: The domain of the continue URL is not allowed. Please add it to the whitelist in the Firebase console.
ERRORS.auth/unsupported-first-factor: You must sign in with a supported first factor before adding a second factor or using multi-factor sign-in.
ERRORS.auth/unsupported-persistence-type: The specified persistence type is not supported in the current environment.
ERRORS.auth/unsupported-tenant-operation: This operation is not supported in a multi-tenant setup.
ERRORS.auth/unverified-email: A verified email is required to complete this operation.
ERRORS.auth/user-cancelled: The user did not grant the necessary permissions to your application.
ERRORS.auth/user-disabled: The user account has been disabled by an administrator.
ERRORS.auth/user-mismatch: The credentials provided do not match the signed-in user.
ERRORS.auth/web-storage-unsupported: Your browser does not support web storage or third-party cookies may be disabled.
ERRORS.auth/already-initialized: initializeAuth() has been called with different options. Please use the same options or call getAuth() to use the existing instance.
